Text: No comment on this particular torrent, but this used to be my favorite movie when I was 10 years old in the mid eighties.  Bull from Night Court as the villain battling a super nerd with a talking wristband that can control traffic lights and ATMs.  I've watched it recently and can't really say it's aged well... but worth a look if you like ultra cheesy eighties sci-fi/fantasy.

As a W.A.S.P. fan I feel compelled to watch this movie.

Thanks to the uploader.
